description: Get AI-generated summaries of user sessions to understand customer behavior and troubleshoot issues faster.

actions.name: identifyUser
actions.description: Create or update user information and traits in LogRocket to contextualize user behavior.

actions.name: requestHighlights
actions.description: Request session highlights for a user. Results will be sent to the webhook URL when ready.

triggers.name: highlightsReady
triggers.description: Trigger when session highlights are ready. Use this webhook URL when requesting highlights.
